repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:14.04 

RUN \
 apt-get update -yq && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -yq \
build-essential \
git \
libsqlite3-dev \
libprotobuf-dev \
protobuf-compiler && \
apt-get clean && \
rm -rf /var/lib/apt && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN \  
git clone https://github.com/mapbox/tippecanoe.git && \  
cd tippecanoe && \  
make && \  
make install
